statements: SELECT * FROM interactions_on_social_media WHERE platform_name = 'Twitter';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_content FROM interactions_on_social_media WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions_on_social_media GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions_on_social_media WHERE interaction_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) AND platform_name = 'Instagram';
SELECT interaction_timestamp, platform_name FROM interactions_on_social_media WHERE interaction_type = 'Like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions_on_social_media WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, platform_name, interaction_type FROM interactions_on_social_media WHERE platform_name = 'Twitter';
SELECT interaction_id, platform_name, interaction_content FROM interactions_on_social_media WHERE interaction_type = 'Reply' AND customer_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions_on_social_media WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND platform_name IN ('Facebook', 'Instagram');
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions_on_social_media GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_category = 'Positive' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_posts WHERE comments_count > 50 AND post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY comments_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, analysis_date;

SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM social_media_posts JOIN sentiment_analysis ON social_media_posts.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id WHERE likes_count > 50 ORDER BY post_date ASC, sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-01' ORDER BY likes_count DESC, comments_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, social_media_handle FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_timestamp, interaction_type, interaction_content FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT sentiment_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 4.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT customer_id, interaction_timestamp, sentiment_score FROM interactions INNER JOIN sentiment_analysis ON interactions.interaction_id = sentiment_analysis.interaction_id WHERE sentiment_score > 4.5;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_timestamp, sentiment_category FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id INNER JOIN sentiment_analysis ON interactions.interaction_id = sentiment_analysis.interaction_id WHERE sentiment_category = 'Positive' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_content FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Review' ORDER BY interaction_content ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_text FROM customer_interactions WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT platform, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY platform;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM platform_users WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_text FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_type ASC;
SELECT sentiment_id, analysis_date, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM platform_users WHERE platform_id = 1 AND user_id <> 2;
SELECT * FROM platform_activity WHERE activity_type IN ('Post', 'Comment') ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT comment_content FROM Comments WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, post_content FROM Customers JOIN Posts ON Customers.customer_id = Posts.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT post_content, post_date, customer_name FROM Posts JOIN Customers ON Posts.customer_id = Customers.customer_id;
SELECT comment_content, comment_date FROM Comments WHERE post_id = 1 ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_likes, customer_name FROM Likes JOIN Customers ON Likes.customer_id = Customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
